adjective.description: Designating a bone of the proximal or upper segment of the limb of a tetrapod (especially a reptile or amphibian); of or relating to the propodium of a tetrapod.
Of or relating to the propodium of a mollusc.

origin: Late 19th century. From pro- + -podial. Compare mesopodial. With use as noun compare later propodium, and also slightly later mesopodial.
